content: What famous British rock band released albums such as "Abbey Road" and "Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band"?

That would be The Beatles, one of the most influential and best-selling bands in the history of music. Their album "Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band" is often regarded as one of the greatest albums ever made, pushing the boundaries of studio recording and conceptual continuity. "Abbey Road," their eleventh studio album, is also highly acclaimed, featuring the side-long medley on side two. Both albums are landmarks in the world of rock music and have left an indelible mark on popular culture.
